div.p: Beulah School District 27 204 5th Street NW Beulah, ND 58523 Site Map
Beulah School District 27 204 5th Street NW Beulah, ND 58523 Site Map
Beulah School District 27 204 5th Street NW Beulah, ND 58523

div.div: If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting Deb Schields, Technology Coordinator at 701-873-2261 or at deb.schields@k12.nd.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. Please note that Beulah Public School District is unable to ensure accessibility on 3rd party sites linked from our website. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act, you may contact our Section 504 coordinator, Colleen Kalvoda, Counselor at Beulah School District 27, 204 5th St. NW, 701-873-2261, or colleen.daley@k12.nd.us.
